description.value: This profile defines the NHS England constraints and extensions on the International FHIR resource [MessageDefinition](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/messagedefinition.html)

purpose.value: This profile defines the characteristics of a message that can be shared between systems. The content of message to be transmitted and the type of event that initiates them, and associated response(s), if any, are permitted.
